name: Locked (itch) (NagusGames)
description:
"I had a dream, robots took over the world. They separated the men from their families and took them to the mountains to die. it is only safe inside the structures. I need to return to my little daughter!.   If they see me, they will kill me but I must try. I must return."

Locked is a first-person exploration game set on a dark forest, full of patrol ships, robots, and something more dangerous. 

You must return to the city, but to do that the 5 security terminals must be disable, robots are not the only danger on  this forest.

Follow me for more games : https://nagusgames.com
